named-query.name: DELETE_NON_DEPENDANT_SHOPPER_BY_UID_LIST
named-query.query: DELETE FROM ShopperMementoImpl sc WHERE sc.uidPk IN (:list) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT scart FROM ShoppingCartMementoImpl scart where scart.shopperUid = sc.uidPk) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT wl FROM WishListImpl wl where wl.shopperUid = sc.uidPk)

named-query.name: DELETE_SHOPPER_BY_UID_LIST
named-query.query: DELETE FROM ShopperMementoImpl sc WHERE sc.uidPk IN (?1)

named-query.name: FIND_SHOPPER_BY_CUSTOMER_GUID_AND_STORECODE
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM ShopperMementoImpl s WHERE s.customer.guid = ?1 AND s.storeCode = ?2 ORDER BY s.uidPk

named-query.name: FIND_SHOPPER_BY_CUSTOMER_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT s.uidPk FROM ShopperMementoImpl s WHERE s.customer.guid = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_SHOPPER_UIDS_BY_CUSTOMER_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT s.uidPk FROM ShopperMementoImpl s WHERE s.customer.uidPk IN (:list)

named-query.name: GET_SHOPPERS_ORPHANED_BY_CUSTOMER_SESSION
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM ShopperMementoImpl s WHERE s.uidPk NOT IN ( SELECT cs.shopperUid FROM com.elasticpath.domain.customer.impl.CustomerSessionMementoImpl cs )

named-query.name: REMOVE_SHOPPERS_IF_ORPHANED
named-query.query: DELETE FROM ShopperMementoImpl s WHERE s.uidPk = ?1 AND s.uidPk NOT IN ( SELECT cs.shopperUid FROM com.elasticpath.domain.customer.impl.CustomerSessionMementoImpl cs )
